name: .VVC File Extension
summary: Learn about .VVC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: VVC files are not meant to be opened. However, players looking to modify the spellcasting effect a VVC file contains can do so using DragonLance Total Conversion Editor Pro (Windows) or VVC Utility (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
